entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Citizen 1995. Data for developing the migration policy strategy: the living conditions of immigrants applying for Hunarian citizenship in 1993.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D21: TÁRKI - Citizen 1995. Data for developing the migration policy strategy: the living conditions of immigrants applying for Hunarian citizenship in 1993.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: description of the past, present and future living condition of persons applying for Hungarian citizenship in 1993
entry.dcterms:subject: minorities
migration
political institutions, public administration
social conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section

Two-stage sampling: 1. settlements where the number of persons applying for Hungarian citizenship in the countryside is above 30, in Budapest above 150; 2. quantifying the number of person living at the selected settlements.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
